H0.text: American singer Katheryn Hudson is better known by what name. Katy Perry

H1.text: American singer Katheryn Hudson is better known by what name. Kate Hudson

H2.text: American singer Katheryn Hudson is better known by what name. Hudson Taylor

H3.text: American singer Katheryn Hudson is better known by what name. KatyCat

A4.text: Katheryn Elizabeth Hudson is known professionally as Katy Perry.

A5.text: In 2003, she briefly performed as Katheryn Perry, to avoid confusion with actress Kate Hudson, and later adopted the stage name 'Katy Perry', using her mother's maiden name.
